 <div>

 <div id="wikicontent">
 <div class="vt" id="wikimaincol">
 <p>To retrieve a list of message recipients for a given Sendible message, make a GET call using basic authentication with the user&#x27;s Sendible username and password </p><h4><a name="URL:"></a>URL:<a href="#URL:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p><a href="http://sendible.com/api/v1/message-recipients.format?type=type" rel="nofollow">http://sendible.com/api/v1/message-recipients.format?type=type</a> </p><h4><a name="Formats:"></a>Formats:<a href="#Formats:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>Replace <tt>format</tt> with either <tt>xml</tt> or <tt>json</tt> </p><h4><a name="HTTP_Methods:"></a>HTTP Methods:<a href="#HTTP_Methods:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>GET </p><h4><a name="Parameters:"></a>Parameters:<a href="#Parameters:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><ul><li><tt>application_id</tt>: Your application id from <a href="http://sendible.com/developers" rel="nofollow">http://sendible.com/developers</a>. </li><li><tt>message_id</tt>: The message id. </li></ul><h4><a name="Authentication:"></a>Authentication:<a href="#Authentication:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><p>Basic authentication with username and password or remote API key belonging to the Sendible user. </p><h4><a name="Success_Response:"></a>Success Response:<a href="#Success_Response:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><pre class="prettyprint">&lt;?xml version=&quot;1.0&quot; encoding=&quot;UTF-8&quot;?&gt;
&lt;user-services type=&quot;array&quot;&gt;
  &lt;user-service&gt;
    &lt;account-name&gt;Twitter - oauth - sendible&lt;/account-name&gt;
    &lt;account-type&gt;Twitteroauth&lt;/account-type&gt;
    &lt;icon-url&gt;http://www.google.com/s2/favicons?domain=twitter.com&lt;/icon-url&gt;
    &lt;recipient-id&gt;6300&lt;/recipient-id&gt;
  &lt;/user-service&gt;
  &lt;user-service&gt;
    &lt;account-name&gt;Ping.fm - info@sendible.com&lt;/account-name&gt;
    &lt;account-type&gt;Pingfm&lt;/account-type&gt;
    &lt;icon-url&gt;http://www.google.com/s2/favicons?domain=ping.fm&lt;/icon-url&gt;
    &lt;recipient-id&gt;6307&lt;/recipient-id&gt;
  &lt;/user-service&gt;
&lt;/user-services&gt;</pre><h4><a name="Error_Response:"></a>Error Response:<a href="#Error_Response:" class="section_anchor"></a></h4><pre class="prettyprint">&lt;error&gt;
&lt;type&gt;InvalidUsernamePassword&lt;/type&gt;
&lt;message&gt;Username/password is invalid.&lt;/message&gt;
&lt;/error&gt;</pre><p>OR </p><pre class="prettyprint">&lt;error&gt;
&lt;type&gt;MessageNotFoundError\&lt;/type&gt;
&lt;message&gt;Message could not be found.&lt;/message&gt;
&lt;/error&gt;</pre>
 </div>
 </div>
